channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists achieve stunning energy breakthrough with tech borrowed from video games: 'A crucial technological innovation'
Exclusive-NATO to ask Berlin for seven more brigades under new targets, sources say
6 tons of cocaine seized from "narco sub" and buried stashes, videos show
I swapped my Tesla for a BYD after getting frustrated with Elon Musk. It was the right decision, but there are some things I miss.
After a 15-year battle, Harvard agrees in settlement to relinquish early photos of slaves
Russia says Trump 'does not fully understand' after criticism of Putin
item.description: Hundreds of Ukrainian drones crossed into Russia overnight into Wednesday morning, dozens of which targeted Moscow.

item.title: After a 15-year battle, Harvard agrees in settlement to relinquish early photos of slaves
item.description: Harvard University will relinquish 175-year-old photographs believed to be the earliest taken of enslaved people.

item.title: Sen. Cory Booker expands upon historic Senate floor speech for new book, 'Stand'
item.description: Sen. Cory Booker has expanded upon his historic Senate floor speech from last month into an upcoming book

item.title: Spelling bee spotlight sparks debate over English's quirks
item.description: Author Gabe Henry's new book "Enough is ENUF" makes the case that English spelling is more confusing than it needs to be.

item.title: WATCH: SpaceX Starship experiences 'rapid unscheduled disassembly'
item.description: SpaceX's lost control of Starship during a test flight on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to swear in Jeanine Pirro as top prosecutor in DC
item.description: Trump escalated his criticism of Russian President Vladimir Putin in a post on Truth Social on Tuesday.

item.title: Lizzy McAlpine talks Broadway debut and TikTok success
item.description: Platinum-selling artist Lizzy McAlpine sits down with Anthony Mason to discuss her viral song "Spring Into Summer," her path to pop stardom and her lo...

item.title: Here's the top predictor of financial well-being, researchers say
item.description: It doesn't take $1 million to secure a sense of financial well-being, according to new research from Vanguard.

item.title: WATCH: Nun surprises with beatboxing skills on Brazilian TV show
item.description: A pair of nuns in Brazil have gone viral for their beatboxing skills during a performance on live TV.

item.title: GameStop purchases $500 million in bitcoin in first crypto push
item.description: GameStop, an ailing video game retailer and "meme stock," is pushing into the cryptocurrency sector.

item.title: "Survivor" cast includes "The White Lotus" creator Mike White for 50th season
item.description: "CBS Mornings" exclusively reveals the cast for the 50th season of "Survivor" featuring fan favorites as returning players.

item.title: Manhunt launched for ex-police chief known as ‘Devil in the Ozarks’ after his escape from prison
New Orleans jail escapees caught following car chase in Texas; 2 inmates still on the run
